title: Store parameter xml size in .px4 file

conversation.author: DonLakeFlyer
conversation.body: This is needed in order to decompress in QGroundControl

issue_comments.author: DonLakeFlyer
issue_comments.body: Hold off on merging this. I have some parameter meta data fixes to go in here as well.

issue_comments.author: DonLakeFlyer
issue_comments.body:
Ok. I've cleaned up the parameter meta data that QGC is complaining about. Specific problems:
- If the param is float or int then the default/min/max values must be float or int. No "1.0" value for an int.
- Float values don't end in "f'. Floats are just 0.0 not 0.0f. This breaks string conversion.

Eventually this will all get better when I switch the firmware to generate param c++ code from xml. This way the parser will validate the xml.
